document_data.name: Ellithral
document_data.mainbody: '''Ellithral the Golden''' was a [[bard]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1375 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Usually Ellithral lived inside the [[Yawning Portal]] inn, telling the adventurers all kinds of tales about [[Undermountain]] for a small fee.
document_data.History: In 1375 DR, Elithral was [[Charm|''charmed'']] by [[Errya Eltorchul]], who ordered him to direct all the adventurers attracted by the dying message of [[Halaster Blackcloak]] to a particular spot in the dungeon with the promise of a map of Undermountain.
document_data.Personality: Ellithral gained his nickname both for his charisma and his heritage.
